page.title: 04HOUSING IN RURAL NORTH WILTS
page.content: There are very few houses in this block. The houses, other than the farmhouses, are spread along the B4040 along with the public house, the sub-post office cum general store, the telephone kiosk (complete with an unusually coloured blue phone) and a post box. Collections and deliveries are once daily excluding Sundays. All amenities on any large scale are at least three miles distant.The houses are all privately owned and the majority of them are more than one hundred years old.
